name: Finding Atlantis
description:
A chill game where you're the captain of a submarine on the search for the legendary lost city of Atlantis. You'll need to pilot the sub on courses to find Atlantian artifacts while avoiding the dangers of the sea. Once you find them all, you will discover the secret of Atlantis...

Global Game Jam 2021 Entry, theme was "lost and found." Main page here: 

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/finding-atlantis-3

Credits:

Taylor Famiglietti
Monish Gupta
Robert Pond
Michael Sciortino
